The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 06 January is 2,450,983 (4,354.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 01 January, there were 326,333 new confirmed cases (579.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 25 December, there were 213,139 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 53% (113,194 extra cases).
